title: Predicate Functions on Dictionary Properties
description: In this lab, you will learn how to create a function that applies a predicate function to a specified property of a dictionary, which can be useful for checking if a certain condition is met for a specific property of a dictionary.

meta.title: Python Functions | Dictionary Property Checking
meta.description: Learn how to create Python functions that apply predicate functions to specific properties of dictionaries, a useful technique for checking conditions on dictionary data.
meta.keywords: Python, functions, dictionaries, property checking, predicate functions

verify.name: Verify Python Script Execution in Temporary Directory
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 字典属性上的谓词函数
i18n.description: 在这个实验中，你将学习如何创建一个函数，该函数将谓词函数应用于字典的指定属性，这对于检查字典的特定属性是否满足某个条件很有用。

meta.title: Python 函数 | 字典属性检查
meta.description: 学习如何创建将谓词函数应用于字典特定属性的 Python 函数，这是一种检查字典数据条件的有用技术。
meta.keywords: Python, 函数, 字典, 属性检查, 谓词函数
